Package cosc202.andie

Class AndieConvolveOp

java.lang.Object
cosc202.andie.AndieConvolveOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
BufferedImageOp
public class AndieConvolveOp extends Object implements BufferedImageOp

This class is a re-implementation of the existing ConvolveOp class. It implements a convolution from the source BufferedImage to the destination BufferedImage using a given convolution kernel.

The output of a pixel is computed by multiplying the kernel with the pixels surrounding the input pixel and getting the sum of these values.

If a pixel is at the edge of an image, i.e. the convolution would be looking for surrounding pixel values outside of the image, the nearest pixel value is taken instead.

  • Method Details

    • filter

      public BufferedImage filter(BufferedImage src, BufferedImage dst)

      Performs a convolution on a BufferedImage, outputting the results to the given destination BufferedImage.

      Specified by:
      filter in interface BufferedImageOp
      Parameters:
      src - The BufferedImage to filter.
      dst - The destination for the filtered BufferedImage.
      Returns:
      The filtered BufferedImage.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if src is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if src equals dst.

    • filter

      public BufferedImage filter(BufferedImage src, BufferedImage dst, int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)

      Performs a convolution on a BufferedImage across a given selection of pixels.

      Parameters:
      src - The BufferedImage to filter.
      dst - The destination for the filtered BufferedImage.
      startX - The X position at the start of the selection (inclusive).
      startY - The Y position at the start of the selection (inclusive).
      endX - The X position at the end of the selection (exclusive).
      endY - The Y position at the end of the selection (exclusive).
      Returns:
      The filtered BufferedImage.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if src is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if src equals dst.

      createCompatibleDestImage in interface BufferedImageOp
      Parameters:
      src - The BufferedImage to be filtered.
      destCM - The ColorModel of the destination, if null, the ColorModel of the src is used.
      Returns:
      The zeroed destination image.

    • getPoint2D

      public Point2D getPoint2D(Point2D srcPt, Point2D dstPt)

      Gets the location of the destination point given a point in the source. If dstPt is not null, it will be used to store the Point2D value.

      The dstPt will be equal to the dstPt.

      Specified by:
      getPoint2D in interface BufferedImageOp
      Parameters:
      srcPt - The Point2D representing the point in the source image.
      dstPt - The Point2D to store the result in.
      Returns:
      The Point2D of the destination point.
